text: Howdy devs! Who is interested in local development on the HubSpot CMS? Join <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> for more details on a new beta local development workflow, allowing you to utilize version control, your favorite text editor and various web development technologies when developing on the HubSpot CMS.
This may already be possible but was wondering with this update if I wanted to have my HubSpot blog post appear in WP is that possible? Should I be worried about this type of duplicate content?
It’s not.  For exactly the reason you mention, duplicate content.  The blog should be in either HubSpot or Wordpress, but not both
So search engines are not smart enough recognized this? I saw this resource linking HS to WP but this would not work?<https://wordpress.org/plugins/connect-HubSpot-blog/#description>

I mean there are things you can do to tell Search Engines about intentional duplicate content, there is a meta tag for that but in general it’s not worth the extra plication.  For the record, that’s not a plugin done by HubSpot so it’s not supported by us

You can create modules in WP that display blog feed via RSS feed... when someone clicks to "read more" it would take them into the HubSpot Blog <@UEZJ74UN8>

If you want it ALL housed in WP... I would just use WP for everything and not use the HubSpot Blog. Not sure the advantages of this, but that's what you'd need to do.
